Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from teacher is context specific and more in depth, feedback from AI is more generalised and not something I wouldn't be able to figure out myself

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback would be taken more seriously by me. AI is untrustworthy alot of the time and I don't highly value feedback from it unless it is completely objective and obvious
